jobPositions.jobTitle: Manager, Web Development, Content and Analytics
jobPositions.jobDescription: Manage NLC overall web presence. Design and develop new features and multimedia projects. Plan and implement a site refresh/responsive design overhaul. Coordinate, redesign, and rebuild all NLC email marketing templates.

jobPositions.jobTitle: User Experience Lead/Senior Front End Developer
jobPositions.jobDescription: Unify designers, front end developers, and information architects, setting standards and advocating for the team. Review wireframes and designs from a technical viewpoint, implement designs in CMSs, including Sitefinity, Expression Engine and WordPress. Provide consultations, train clients, teach workshops and webinars.

Design wireframes, moodboards, style guides, and site/app designs. Bridge design and development teams. Implement designs into CMSs, including WordPress, Expression Engine, CommonSpot, and custom ColdFusion. Lead client trainings.

Support university departments with web sites, blogs and wikis. Establish and maintain WordPress multisite installation. Create WordPress themes and instructional videos/animations. Design posters, brochures, logos, shirts, etc. Mentor students and teach workshops for faculty and staff.
Maintain pictureframes.com, e-promos, quarterly print catalog, high-end photo editing.
Design/development of websites, e-promos, ads, animations, presentations, logos, stationary packages, brochures, shirts, etc. Educational/instructional drawings for UNCG.
Maintain pevonia.com, ads for spafinder.com, presentations, print design for spa menus/flyers.
